attributes.action: Make the sale of Alcohol for human consumption Illegal and classify it a poison.

attributes.background: Alcohol use should be made Illegal, it is a poison that kills thousands of people, its use is involved in thousands of crimes and costs the UK Millions in tax payers earnings, EVERY YEAR. Without Alcohol freely available for consumption, life for many people would have been without Domestic Violence
